lead_paragraph: Stumper Jos Buttler has done enough with the bat in the one-day series against Sri Lanka to be considered purely as a batsman for the test series against Pakistan, England coach Trevor Bayliss has said.

headline.print_headline: Buttler to Be Considered Purely as Batsman for Tests, Hints Bayliss
headline.main: Buttler to Be Considered Purely as Batsman for Tests, Hints Bayliss

snippet: Stumper Jos Buttler has done enough with the bat in the one-day series against Sri Lanka to be considered purely as a batsman for the test series against Pakistan, England coach Trevor Bayliss has said....
